content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and transport belts (positions (-16.5, -51.5), (-15.5, -51.5))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and transport belts (positions (-16.5, -51.5), (-15.5, -51.5), (-14.5, -51.5), (-13.5, -51.5))
### Iron Plate Factory at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) and transport belts (positions (-14.5, -51.5), (-13.5, -51.5))
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) and transport belts (positions (-12.5, -48.5), (-12.5, -47.5))
### Storage at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5))
-  Burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) 

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item but being unable to find a nearby entity that can accept the item
-  Ensure that there is a nearby entity that can accept the item before attempting to insert it
### Errors when mining but having no fuel
-  Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine
### Errors when smelting but having no ingredients
-  Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients before attempting to smelt
### Errors when using inserter but having no source items
-  Ensure that the inserter has source items before attempting to use it

### NAMESPACE
*   Defined functions: 
    *   insert_item: Inserts an item into a nearby entity
    *   get_entities: Returns a list of entities on the map
    *   get_inventory: Returns the current inventory
*   Important variables: 
    *   inventory (dict): The current inventory
    *   entities (list): The list of entities on the map
    *   position (tuple): The current position of the agent
